item.title: What is Cloud Computing ?
item.description: Cloud computing is the delivery of computing services — servers, storage, databases, networking, software, analytics and more—over the Internet (“the cloud”).

item.title: Elastic Beanstalk - Install EB CLI
item.description: The Elastic beanstalk is a command line tool, provide to manage EB environment from command line. EB CLI give you facility create, configure and manage the EB environement.
